title: im very new
body: ok so its my first time joining lol, and i accidentally skipped all the tutorials and everything. and right now, i dont know what to do. please help me, i really want to experience playing lol.

replies.body: yeah but right now i cant see a play button but i do see something loading

> yeah but right now i cant see a play button but i do see something loading

Another good place to learn how to play the game is in the Co-op vs A.I. matches. Choose Intro level bots. You'll get tips on the screen every few minutes that teach you some basics about the game.

Ahhhh so right now you're most likely patching. After the game installs, you do need to grab the latest patch files before you can play. In the meantime, try checking out Twitch or Youtube to see some gameplay so you can get yourself ready ^_^!
